subproject.description: This project provides support to enhancing juvenile justice in Syria through the leveraging of specialized capacity development programmes and sensitization programmes for select pilot Juvenile Reform Institutions in Syria.  The project will also work on the policy level through the creation of a Juvenile Information System to facilitate the processing and necessary follow up on juvenile cases as well as familiarize key stakeholders with international standards and models of juvenile justice in order to support a national strategy for legislative reform in the application of juvenile justice.  Project will also focus on the integration of psycho-social support and vocational training in Juvenile Reform Institutions as well as work to improve interaction and coordination between relevant parties mandated in juvenile processing, rehabilitation and monitoring.
donor_long: MINISTRY OF SOCIAL AFFAIRS AND LABOUR
subproject.title: AN ENHANCED JUVENLE JUSTICE SY

subproject.corporate outcome: Modernization of national and local administrations, with focus on facilitation of equitable and simplified public service delivery to citizens; as well as promotion of accessible and fair justice systems.

title: SUPPORT TO JUVENLE JUSTICE IN SYRIA
